display_help: The ground beneath you has been altered by liquefaction due to the earthshaking song of the Siren, which instantly causes you to suffer smashing and energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
